Help.question: The main question or title of the bet that players will see.
Help.type: Choose the betting format: Multiple Choice for options, Match for exact score predictions, Range for number guessing.
Help.startTime: When the event starts. Betting will be locked before this time based on your lock setting.
Help.eventEndTime: Optional: Set this for long-running bets (e.g., season MVP, weekly stats). Auto-resolution waits until this time passes.
Help.lockBetting: When betting closes. 'At Start' locks at kick-off, other options lock earlier for safety.
Help.options: Add the possible outcomes players can bet on. Minimum 2 options required.
Help.homeTeam: The home team for this match. Used for displaying team logos.
Help.awayTeam: The away team for this match. Used for displaying team logos.
Help.rangeMin: The minimum value players can guess.
Help.rangeMax: The maximum value players can guess.
Help.rangeUnit: The unit of measurement (e.g., goals, points, seconds).
Help.projectLeague: Enter a sports league or topic (e.g., 'Premier League', 'NBA', 'Champions League').
Help.timeframe: Specify when the events occur (e.g., 'This Weekend', 'Next Week', 'Today').
Help.bulkType: Choose between exact score predictions or winner choice bets.
Help.outcomeOptions: 1x2 includes Draw option, Winner is 2-way (no draw).
Help.leagueName: A unique name for your betting league visible to all members.
Help.leagueMode: Arcade: Play for points, highest score wins. Zero-Sum: Real betting simulation with dynamic odds.
Help.buyInType: Fixed: Everyone starts with same points. Flexible: Players can buy points anytime.
Help.startCapital: How many points each player starts with.
Help.rebuyUnit: The standard amount for purchasing additional points.
Help.endDate: When the league ends. A winner is determined after this date.
Help.aiAutoPopulate: Let AI find upcoming matches and create bets automatically.
Help.disputeWindow: Time players have to dispute a result before it's finalized.
Help.aiAutoConfirm: Automatically resolve bets using AI when events finish. Saves manual work.
Help.points_winner: Points awarded for correctly predicting the match winner.
Help.points_diff: Points awarded for predicting correct goal difference.
Help.points_exact: Points awarded for predicting the exact score.
Help.points_choice: Points awarded for correct multiple choice answers.
Help.points_range: Points awarded for correct range/number predictions.
Help.powerBoost: Multiply your points reward with a power-up. Higher risk, higher reward!
Help.wagerAmount: How many points to bet. You'll lose these if wrong, win based on odds if correct.
Help.confirmNow: Skip the proofing period and immediately finalize this bet with payouts.
Help.resetBet: Reset this bet back to LOCKED status. Use if the result was entered incorrectly.
Help.dispute: Challenge this result if you believe it's incorrect. Admins will review.

p1.title: Welcome to GambleGang! üéÆ
p1.subtitle: Your social prediction league
p1.text: GambleGang is where you and your friends compete by predicting match scores, picking winners, and climbing the leaderboard together.
p1.note: No real money - just bragging rights!

p2.title: Two Ways to Play
p2.subtitle: Know your league mode
p2.text: Before you join, check the league mode! There are two completely different ways to play:
p2.arcadeText: Play for points. High score wins. Fixed rewards.
p2.zeroSumText: Betting sim. Dynamic odds. Pot split.

p3.title: Mode A: Arcade
p3.subtitle: The strategic accumulator
p3.text: Earn points for every correct prediction. The awards are fixed:

p4.title: Arcade Power-Ups
p4.subtitle: Boost your score
p4.text: Arcade players get a limited supply of Power-Ups. Use them to multiply your points on your most confident bets!
p4.note: ‚ö†Ô∏è Strategy Tip: Don't waste a x4 boost on a risky bet!

p5.title: Mode B: Zero Sum
p5.subtitle: The cutthroat simulator
p5.text: This is a real betting simulation. There are no magical points created out of thin air.
p5.cardText: The odds are calculated based on how everyone bets (Parimutuel betting). If everyone bets on the favorite, the payout is low. If you win on the underdog, you take the pot!

p6.title: Zero Sum Variants
p6.subtitle: Sudden Death or Uncapped?
p6.text: Check which variant your league is using:
p6.suddenDeathText: You start with fixed chips. If you hit 0, you're eliminated. Survival of the fittest.
p6.uncappedText: Run out of chips? Just re-buy more. The pot grows indefinitely.

p7.title: Live Action
p7.subtitle: Watch scores update in real-time
p7.text: Once kick-off starts, the app comes alive:

p8.title: Bet Lifecycle
p8.subtitle: From open to payout
p8.step1: OPEN - Place bets before lock time

p9.title: Disputes & Voting
p9.subtitle: Community justice system
p9.text: Think a result is wrong? You can Dispute it during the proofing window!
p9.cardText: Once disputed, all members can vote. If >50% agree the result is wrong, the bet becomes INVALID.
p9.note: üö´ Invalid bets are cancelled and all wagers are returned to players.

p10.title: Analytics & Audit
p10.subtitle: Transparency is key
p10.text: Check your performance stats and verify every single bet result.
p10.item1Text: See your win rate, profit trends, and head-to-head stats.
p10.item2Text: Open any resolved bet to see exactly who voted for what and how the points were distributed.
p10.note: Full transparency: The math is always open for you to check.

c1.title: Create Your League
c1.subtitle: Be the commissioner
c1.text: Ready to run your own betting league? As a creator, you control everything:

c2.title: AI Bet Wizard
c2.subtitle: Auto-generate bets instantly
c2.text: Don't want to create bets manually? Use our AI Wizard!
c2.note: The AI fetches real schedules and creates bets with correct teams, dates, and lock times.

c3.title: Choose Your Path
c3.subtitle: Arcade vs Zero Sum
c3.text: Your first decision as a creator: What kind of experience do you want?
c3.arcadeText: Casual fun. Points, power-ups, and custom scoring rules. Best for friends competing for a high score.
c3.zeroSumText: Hardcore simulation. Real odds, chip economy, and bankruptcy risks. For serious strategists.

c4.title: Configure Scoring
c4.subtitle: Customize point values
c4.text: Set your own scoring rules for the entire league, or customize per bet:
c4.note: ‚öôÔ∏è Option: Disable "Diff" points for draws to encourage riskier predictions

c5.title: Power-Up Inventory
c5.subtitle: Control the boosters
c5.text: Configure how many power-ups each player gets:
c5.note: Scarcity creates strategy! Players must choose when to use their boosters wisely.

zs1.title: Zero Sum Mechanics
zs1.subtitle: No points, just chips
zs1.text: In Zero Sum, custom scoring is disabled. The economy runs itself:
zs1.item1Text: Odds are calculated dynamically based on how everyone bets.
zs1.item2Text: Winners split the losers' chips. The house takes nothing.
zs1.note: The system handles all the math automatically.

zs2.title: Elimination Rules
zs2.subtitle: Define the stakes
zs2.text: Choose how your league handles bankruptcy:
zs2.sdText: Hardcore. If a player hits 0 chips, they are eliminated from the league permanently.
zs2.ucText: Forgiving. Players can re-buy or go into negative debt to keep playing. Infinite variance.

c6.title: Dispute Window
c6.subtitle: Fair result verification
c6.text: After a result is entered, there's a proofing period where players can dispute if they think it's wrong.
c6.cardText: Admins review the dispute. If valid, result is corrected. If not, original stands.

c7.title: Auto-Resolution
c7.subtitle: Hands-free result entry
c7.text: Enable Auto-Resolution to let the system resolve bets automatically:
c7.apiText: Real sports results fetched automatically. Works with major football leagues, NBA, NHL, etc.
c7.aiText: AI searches the web for results. Works with any event including non-sports.

c8.title: Activity Log & Analytics
c8.subtitle: Track everything
c8.text: As an admin, you have full visibility into league activity:
c8.analyticsText: Profit charts, ROI trends, rankings over time
c8.betAuditText: See who bet on what & point distribution
